items.question: Do I need internet access to use MedFinder?
items.answer: MedFinder works in offline mode for most features like inventory tracking and sales. You only need internet to sync data with the cloud or manage multiple stores.

items.question: Can I manage multiple pharmacy branches?
items.answer: Yes! Our Multi-store support allows you to manage inventory, staff, and sales for all your branches from a single dashboard.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. Cloud backups ensure you never lose your records even if you lose your phone.

items.question: What languages does the app support?
items.answer: MedFinder is fully localized in English, Amharic, Afaan Oromo, and Tigrinya.

items.question: How do I pay for the subscription?
items.answer: We accept payments via Telebirr, CBE Birr, and other local payment methods directly within the app.

about.title: About MedFinder
about.mission: We are on a mission to digitize Ethiopia's pharmaceutical supply chain, one pharmacy at a time.
about.story_p1: Founded in 2024, MedFinder started with a simple observation: pharmacies in Ethiopia were struggling with manual inventory management and disjointed supply chains.
about.story_p2: We built a mobile-first solution designed specifically for the local context, working offline and supporting local languages. Today, we empower hundreds of pharmacies to run more efficiently and serve their communities better.
